title: Editors’ Choice: A passage to India?
summary_full: Both the EU-India and Mercosur deals make clear that when it comes to trade, Ursula von der Leyen’s Commission won’t let the perfect be the enemy of the good
summary_public: Both the EU-India and Mercosur deals make clear that when it comes to trade, Ursula von der Leyen’s Commission won’t let the perfect be the enemy of the good
